Package pointOfSales.entities

Class employee

java.lang.Object
pointOfSales.entities.employee
public class employee extends Object
Represents an employee in the point of sales system.

  • Constructor Details

    • employee

      public employee(Connection conn)
      Initializes an employee with a database connection.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to be used.

    • employee

      public employee(Connection conn, String FirstName, String LastName, String Position, String Passcode)
      Initializes an employee with essential details.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to be used.
      FirstName - First name of the employee.
      LastName - Last name of the employee.
      Position - Position of the employee (e.g., MANAGER, CASHIER).
      Passcode - Unique passcode for the employee.

    • employee

      public employee(Connection conn, String FirstName, String LastName, String Position, String Email, String PhoneNumber, String HireDate, String Passcode)
      Initializes an employee with detailed attributes.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to be used.
      FirstName - First name of the employee.
      LastName - Last name of the employee.
      Position - Position of the employee (e.g., MANAGER, CASHIER).
      Email - Email of the employee.
      PhoneNumber - Phone number of the employee.
      HireDate - The date the employee was hired.
      Passcode - Unique passcode for the employee.

  • Method Details

    • createEmployee

      public void createEmployee()
      Adds the employee to the database.

    • getEmployeeByID

      public employee getEmployeeByID(int EmployeeID)
      Retrieves an employee from the database by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      EmployeeID - The unique identifier for the employee.
      Returns:
      An employee object if found; null otherwise.

    • getEmployeeByName

      public static int getEmployeeByName(Connection conn, String FirstName, String LastName)
      Retrieves an employee's unique ID by their first and last name.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to be used.
      FirstName - First name of the employee.
      LastName - Last name of the employee.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier for the employee if found; -1 otherwise.

    • verifyEmployee

      public static ArrayList<String> verifyEmployee(Connection conn, String pw)
      Verifies an employee's credentials based on their passcode.
      Parameters:
      conn - The database connection to be used.
      pw - The passcode to verify.
      Returns:
      A list containing the verified employee's first name, last name, position, and ID.
